description: Over the years, Navalny’s health had declined as he had been physically attacked, arrested, harassed and, in 2020, poisoned with a Soviet-era nerve agent.
title: Navalny’s health in harsh prison system was major concern before death

description: As Russian prison authorities announced the death of the political opposition leader, Yulia Navalnaya was in Germany to attend the Munich Security Conference.
title: Alexei Navalny’s wife and two children learned of his death from afar

description: The announcement followed a constitutional court ruling declaring Macky Sall’s delay of the elections illegal.
title: Senegal’s president says election will be held ‘as soon as possible’

description: The opposition leader’s death — foretold as almost inevitable, including by Navalny himself — sent shock waves across Russia and was quickly condemned by global leaders.
title: For Putin nemesis Alexei Navalny, long-feared death arrives in Arctic prison

description: In a video released by the Russian news outlet Sota, Navalny, known for his humor and charisma, teased the judge overseeing his case Thursday.
title: Video of Navalny shows him joking and smiling Thursday

description: Harry was also asked about King Charles’s cancer diagnosis but did not reveal much in his interview with Good Morning America.
title: Prince Harry says, yeah, he has considered becoming a U.S. citizen, maybe

description: Beatles fans were able to reunite Paul McCartney with his Höfner bass guitar that was stolen in 1972 and sold to a pub landlord, Ronald Guest.
title: Paul McCartney’s bass guitar was missing for 51 years. Fans helped find it.

description: Russia’s jailed opposition leader, Alexei Navalny, died in a Russian prison colony on Friday, Russia’s prison service announced in the early afternoon, without giving the cause of his death. News of his death flooded across Russian Telegram news channels early Friday afternoon and was later confirmed in a curt announcement by prison authorities.
title: In photos: Alexei Navalny, Russian opposition leader, dies at 47

description: Kremlin critic and opposition figure Alexei Navalny died Friday in a Russian penal colony. He long challenged Russian President Vladimir Putin.
title: Who was Alexei Navalny, Russian opposition leader and Putin critic?

description: South Korea’s demographic crisis is becoming so existential, and government efforts to change it are so ineffective, that businesses are now hunting for solutions.
title: How much is a baby worth? A $75,000 bonus, this South Korean firm says.

description: Telegenic and charismatic, he emerged as a leading activist against Russian President Vladimir Putin and exposed self-dealing at the highest levels of power.
title: Alexei Navalny, imprisoned Russian opposition leader, dies at 47

description: The opposition leader and anti-corruption crusader had been imprisoned since 2021 on charges widely viewed as trumped up for political retribution.
title: Live updates: Alexei Navalny, Russian opposition leader, dies in prison, officials say

description: A covert Kremlin disinformation campaign targeted Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky with the aim of dividing Ukrainian society, documents show.
title: Kremlin runs disinformation campaign to undermine Zelensky, documents show

description: The vast rainforest has for 65 million years has served as the Earth’s carbon sink. Its collapse would expedite global warming, researchers say.
title: Parts of Amazon rainforest could tip toward collapse by 2050, study warns

description: Vice President Harris and Secretary of State Antony Blinken will try to convince European allies that the U.S. commitment to Ukraine and NATO remains steadfast.
title: U.S. political uncertainty looms over key security conference in Munich

description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said unilateral recognition of a Palestinian state would be a “huge reward” for Hamas.
title: Middle East conflict live updates: Netanyahu rejects international pressure on peace plan, Palestinian state

description: The victory for the country’s LGBTQ community comes despite opposition from the influential and socially conservative Greek Orthodox Church.
title: Greece becomes first Orthodox Christian country to legalize same-sex marriage

description: President Biden said he will not support a full-scale assault on Rafah without “a credible plan” from Israel to evacuate Palestinian civilians in harm’s way. Such a concrete plan, at present, does not exist.
title: As Israel corners Rafah, Netanyahu defies the world

description: The Israel Defense Forces said it was searching for the bodies of hostages. One patient was killed and others were injured in the raid, the Gaza Health Ministry said.
title: Israel raids Nasser Hospital in Gaza; doctors describe gunfire

description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has rejected a Senate bill that would fund Ukraine, Israel and others, driving some lawmakers to explore how they could force a vote.
title: Ukraine backers in House explore bypassing Johnson to secure more aid

description: Agency officials declined to provide details about Joel Martinez’s alleged wrongdoing, citing privacy laws, but said he was not under arrest.
title: Border Patrol’s acting deputy chief suspended for alleged misconduct
